Title: Glade Guard
Intro: Each model in a Glade Guard unit is armed with a Longbow and Glade Blade.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Lord’s Bowman. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Longbow.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Pennant Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit if it includes any Pennant Bearers. Add 2 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit instead if it includes any Pennant Bearers and it is in cover.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be Hornblowers. You can re-roll run rolls for this unit if it includes any Hornblowers.

Rules.Name: Peerless Archery
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit in the shooting phase if it has more than 10 models and is more than 3" from all enemy units.

Rules.Name: Arcane Bodkins
Rules.Rule: Once per battle, in your shooting phase, you can say that this unit will fire its Arcane Bodkins. If you do so, change the Rend characteristic of this unit’s Longbows to -3 until the end of that phase.
